title: Healthy Living
description: Clean up your life with our Organic Chix Healthy Living collection featuring DEET-free mosquito repellant, germ defense hand santizer spray, germ defense essential oil and Nature Mist essential oil diffuser and magnesium spray. All of our Healthy Living collection is chemical and dye-free, making it safe to use on even
cleaned_text: Beeswax Candles | Non-toxic, Sustainable & Clean Burning | Natural Wood Wick Candles Our 100% pure organic 12 oz beeswax candles contain maximum, 2 high-quality ingredients only. Ingredients consist of: Pure organic beeswax from a local beekeeping farm + 100% pure essential oils. Keep your house smelling great, while making sure you aren't burning any toxins/chemicals in your home. The candle jar is recycled glass that can be reused or popped in your household recycle bin. Choose from a variety of 100% pure essential oils for fragranced candles or keep it simple with our naturally scented beeswax candle. They come in gorgeous glass jars, with multiple color options, to match any decor style. Optional add on: Biodegradable, brown pine wood lids. Reuse your wooden lid for your next candle purchase! Product description: - Wax: 100% pure organic beeswax from local beekeeping farm - Fragrance: 100% pure, sustainably sourced wicks. - Glass Jar: 100% recyclable/reusable glass containers. - Wooden Lid: Biodegradable brown pine wood. - Free of dyes, artificial fragrances, additives, and other waxes. - Free of toxins, phthalates, petroleum, paraffin, parabens, sulfates, led, soy, oils, synthetic fragrances and cruelty. Scent options: BLOOD ORANGE- grapefruit + orange + lemon. Jar Color - Clay PURE BEESWAX- 100% pure beeswax, no added fragrance. Smells like sweet honey. Jar Color - Black SUNKISSED- pistachio + almond + vanilla + caramel + sandalwood. Jar Color - Matte Nude SUNSHINE- azalea + jasmine + lavender + patchouli + balsam + vanilla. Jar Color - Matte White DULCE: cinnamon + nutmeg + clove + vanilla. Jar Color - Matte Dark Brown HARVEST: pumpkin + nutmeg + cinnamon + clove. Jar Color - Clay HONEYCRISP: apple + cinnamon. Jar Color - Green TOASTY: ginger + cinnamon + vanilla. Jar Color - Matte Nude
